description: Minimal discriminant of number field of degree n.
references: H. Hasse, Number Theory, Springer-Verlag, NY, 1980, p. 617.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: A. M. Odlyzko, Bounds for discriminants and related estimates for class numbers, regulators and zeros of zeta functions: A survey of recent results, Sem. Theorie des Nombres, Bordeaux, 2 (1990), pp. 119-141.

author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
